quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Confirm whether the conversion from realistic sheep to chibi characters was executed properly, observing their overall appearance and proportions.
quality_check_questions.question: Have the three sheep been converted into chibi characters?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Check if all specified winter accessories have been added successfully, focusing on the presence of scarves, earmuffs, and gloves.
quality_check_questions.question: Do the chibi characters have scarves, earmuffs, and gloves added as winter accessories?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Evaluate if the original interaction pose and location near the railing were preserved in the edited image.
quality_check_questions.question: Has the interaction pose of the chibi characters by the railing been maintained?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Assess the application of the flat, cartoonish style with thick outlines, ensuring the art style aligns with the instructions.
quality_check_questions.question: Are the chibi characters depicted in a flat, cartoonish style with thick outlines?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Check if the background has been rendered transparent, ensuring suitability for sticker use as per the instructions.
quality_check_questions.question: Is the background of the image transparent for sticker use?
